data.title: Just ok
data.text: First time coming to this location and I'm not sure if I'll be coming back. I'm not sure if the customer service was lackluster because it was late at night, but the cashier seem slightly annoyed while ordering my sister and I food. She gave my sister a vanilla shake instead of the chocolate that she ordered and didn't mention that they were running low on chocolate. We also couldn't make two separate orders in the drive through like we usually do at McDonald's. Food was okay good for the price. Still not pleased with the service to comeback though.

data.title: Always good
data.text: Yes it's a fast food place but it's always hot good and not a bad price. Much better than most fast food places the fries are to die for and for gosh sakes they have banana shakes!!!! Mr Pibb to drink is a delight!!!
